description: Despite being only friends with Shuu and having one sided feelings for him, it seems Shuu also has feelings for her which he did not come to realization till it was too late. Her death hurt him the most which drove him over the edge to the point of losing some of his sanity. He was treating friends and enemies in the same way till the school rebellion which led to his common sense coming back.
name: Menjou Hare
